structure.unit: Nominations, Questions To Be Submitted To The Voters, Primaries And Caucuses

law.catch_line: Nomination Papers; Delivery To City Or Town Clerk
law.text: Not less than seven week days before the day upon which the caucuses are to be held and before five oâ€™clock in the afternoon of the last day, the secretary of each city or town committee shall deliver to the city or town clerk the nomination papers filed with him.
